astromart.description: Worked on Astromart: a performant e-commerce template for Astro, React, TypeScript and Odoo developers

kds_wahalla.description: Built KDS Wahalla, a performant kitchen display system for restaurants, using React, TypeScript, elevating restaurant efficiency.

kobraza_imoveis.description: Built a website for Kobraza Imóveis. Kobraza Imóveis is a real estate agency that has operated for over 30 years in the market, with a wide range of properties, including commercial properties, such as warehouses, gas stations and warehouses; residential properties such as houses, apartments and lofts; and rural properties, such as farms and farms.

leonardo_nutrition.description: Added CMS Integration and Testimonials with social login for Leonardo Nutrition, a nutritionist and dietitian in Brazil.
